title: New: Kitty Pryde – Everything Is Embarrassing (Sky Ferreira Cover)
body:
_Kitty Pryde_ singing? I can’t decide whether this is a piss-take or not, and whether it’s actually her on this track.

The quirky rapper isn’t known for her singing abilities, however she nails this version of **Sky Ferreira’s** _Everything is Embarrassing, _which was just uploaded to Kitty’s [Tumblr](http://kittydothedishes.tumblr.com/post/58361897992/i-got-my-mic-back). Whatever, I think it’s awesome. Anyway, check it out below, and see what you think.
